DialogueText.Text: Have you had any luck in finding the Tablet?

Its... BROKEN?! How!? ... Hmm, the Temple is indeed very old, but still, I can't believe time could wear down such a finely crafted artifact... Hm, could it be...? Give me time, I must confer with the others. Thank you as always for your hard work; even if we didn't get the result we were hoping for. Hopefully I'll return with some good news.
Ah, no worries. Continue you're search; I'm certain we'll find what we need.
